metadata.title: Friday, 29th November, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    how many boreholes were sank in Kasempa District in 2012;
(b)    how many boreholes are earmarked to be sank in 2013; and
(c)    of the boreholes at (b), how many were sank as of 30th September, 2013.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    when construction of Zambezi West Bank Secondary School in Sesheke will commence;
(b)    when construction works will be completed; and
(c)    what the cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and
parts: (a)    when the Government will construct bridges across the following Rivers in Lukulu and Mitete Districts:
(b)    if the Government has no plans to construct bridges at (a), why; and
(c)    when the Government will provide a pontoon on the Lungwebungu River in Mitete District. QUESTION FOR WRITTEN ANSWER W13    Mr Mwanza (Solwezi West) - to ask the Minister of Finance:
(a)    whether there are any cooperating partners that have withdrawn their support to the Republic of Zambia;
(b)    if there are none, what the funding status of the following donor agencies in 2013 has been:
(c)    how many cooperating partners are providing support to the following provinces:

(i)    North-Western; (ii)    Eastern; and (iii)    Southern. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply:  Resumption of Debate: (Head 89/29: under consideration). Heads 89/30, 89/31, 89/32, 89/33, 89/34, 89/36, 89/37, 80/01, 80/02, 80/03, 80/04, 80/05, 80/06, 80/08, 80/09, 80/10, 80/11, 80/12, 80/13, 80/14, 80/15, 80/16, 80/17, 80/18, 80/19, 80/20, 80/21, 80/22, 80/23, 80/24, 80/25, 80/26, 80/27, 80/28, 80/29, 80/30, 80/31, 80/32, 80/33, 80/34, 80/35, 80/36, 80/37, 80/38, 80/39, 80/40, 80/41, 80/42, 80/43, 80/44, 80/45, 80/46, 80/47, 80/48, 80/49, 87/01, 44/01, 44/02, 44/03, 44/04, 44/05 and 44/06 - for consideration.
